title: Diesel Engine Governors
creator_credit: United States. Navy. Bureau of Aeronautics
brief_description: Discusses three main assemblies of the governor and explains its function in regulating the amount of fuel injected into a diesel engine. Reviews the operation of the manual fuel control to explain the action of the governor through low, intermediates and high-speed ranges.
description: Discusses three main assemblies of the governor and explains its function in regulating the amount of fuel injected into a diesel engine. Reviews the operation of the manual fuel control to explain the action of the governor through low, intermediates and high-speed ranges.
